name: Knossos (itch) (Virdi22)
description:
"What is going on here? Why was I left in the trash... am I... defective?"

Knossos is a short graphic adventure game, with puzzle elements, made as a Master's final degree project.

In Knossos you control TS-41, a robot left who wakes up inside a trash bin without any memories of what happened or why they got there.

During the game, TS-41 has to make use of their logic to solve the puzzles thrown at them, continue through the facilities, and discover what happened while they were deactivated.

Which circumstances lead the lab to be empty? What's TS-41's role in those events? Discover it by playing the game.
